titleStmt.title: By His Highnesse the Prince of VVales.
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

titleStmt.title: By His Highnesse the Prince of VVales.
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: "The Lords Willoughby, Hopton, and Culpepper, together with His Highnesse secretary, or any two of them, are appointed to digest these heads into a declaration, and to present it to His Highnesse in councell. Dated 27 Julii, novo stilo, 1648. Charles P.".
Identified as Wing C3195 on UMI microfilm reel 1845 "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproductions of the originals in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London (Early English books, filmed twice) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
